title: Storm Dress
narrative_story: Fashion Week began with clothing spread across every surface. Inside the tents, designers prepared their grief-stricken collections—mourning clothes for the Yuan dynasty's distant memory. The reviews were bad. At the elementary level, models clutched towels and arranged cloth. One wore a dramatic hat. Another adjusted curtains made of cotton. Assistants rushed to help at the market booth selling accessories for the lungs—breathing masks wrapped with sashes. The air grew stagnant. A thorn pricked one model's finger. The system broke down. They had to manufacture replacements quickly. Then someone uttered: 'Look at the sky.' The rain began. Clouds gathered. Thunder rolled across the heavens. Electricity crackled. Frost formed on the windows. Ice covered the runway. Winter had arrived during summer. The heavens themselves seemed to die young. Models pretended to cross the bridge while looking attractive. Those still standing began to weep at the station. A new chapter began as designers competed. The sovereign watched with juvenile amusement as bells rang. A salesman declared the show suitable for enemies. With ancient spoons they ate from the north, backs turned to compare descendants. Everything mixed together—all of this somewhat blurred. It had lost its purpose. Grease stained every fabric. Every small plum tree by the sea seemed to beg: eat me while I'm still dry. They tried to duplicate the original designs. Models clutched their abdomens, lacking strength. They blew their last song into the soft wind. Next time, they'd protect their assets. Their looks would need consultation.
narrative_arc: Fashion Week descends into chaos as an apocalyptic storm transforms a clothing showcase into a frozen hellscape where models and designers struggle to survive nature's fury
callbacks: Weather elements connect to the Elements theme; Clothing recalls the fabric of civilization from earlier lessons

characters.narrative_position: Fashion Week began with CLOTHING spread across every surface
characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of a robe with collar and sleeves
characters.story: My CLOTHING is stripped away in the prison yard. I SING 'YEEEEE!' - sustained humiliation - naked before the guards.

characters.narrative_position: INSIDE the tents, designers prepared their collections
characters.mnemonic_image: Clothing + village = the inside lining of clothes
characters.story: INSIDE my coat lining, I hide the last photo of my family. I GROAN 'Leee...' - low secrecy - the guards must never find it.

characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth + clothing = crying into one's clothes, grief
characters.story: GRIEF consumes me at the mass grave. I SING 'EYEEEEE!' - sustained wailing - but the dead don't answer back.

characters.narrative_position: Mourning clothes for the YUAN dynasty
characters.mnemonic_image: Earth + mouth + clothing = the Yuan family's robes
characters.story: The YUAN family's robes are soaked in their blood. I GASP 'YUAN?!' - the whole clan executed for treason.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at family destruction

characters.mnemonic_image: Walk + Yuan = walking far, becoming distant
characters.story: Home grows DISTANT with each forced march. I GROAN 'Yuannnn...' - low fading - I'll never see it again.

characters.mnemonic_image: Earth + clothing + eye = earthly things broken, spoiled
characters.story: Everything I touch turns BAD. 'HWAI!' I COMMAND myself to stop destroying - but ruin follows me like a shadow.

characters.narrative_position: At the ELEMENTARY level, models clutched towels
characters.mnemonic_image: Clothing + knife = first cutting of cloth, beginning
characters.story: At the BEGINNING, I was innocent. I SING 'CHOOOO!' - sustained nostalgia - before they made me into this.

characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of a hanging cloth or towel
characters.story: I wipe blood from my hands with a TOWEL. I SING 'JEEEEEN!' - sustained scrubbing - but the stains won't come out.

characters.narrative_position: Models clutched towels and arranged CLOTH
characters.mnemonic_image: Napkin + hand = spreading cloth
characters.story: The execution CLOTH covers their faces. 'BOO!' I COMMAND the firing squad - and the cloth blooms red.

characters.mnemonic_image: Cloth + eye + sun = covering for head, hat
characters.sound_bridge: MAOW = 'MEOW the cat took my hat'
characters.story: The dunce HAT marks me as an intellectual. 'MAOW!' the crowd COMMANDS me to bow - public humiliation in the square.

characters.narrative_position: Another adjusted CURTAINS made of cotton
characters.mnemonic_image: Grass + sun + towel = covering like a curtain
characters.story: Behind the CURTAIN, they prepare the noose. 'MOO!' the executioner COMMANDS the stage set - the final act begins.

characters.mnemonic_image: Tree + white + towel = cotton from plant fibers
characters.story: COTTON stuffs the wounds but won't stop the bleeding. I GASP 'MYAN?!' - more cotton, more blood, never enough.

characters.mnemonic_image: State + cloth + strength = helping with cloth work
characters.story: The gang HELPS me escape - or so I thought. I SING 'BAHNGGG!' - sustained gratitude - before realizing they sold me out.

characters.narrative_position: At the MARKET booth selling accessories
characters.mnemonic_image: Cloth + above = cloth hanging at market stalls
characters.story: The MARKET sells human beings now. 'SHIH!' the auctioneer COMMANDS higher bids - I'm worth less than a pig.

characters.mnemonic_image: Flesh + market = the organs sold at market, lungs
characters.story: My LUNGS fill with tear gas. 'FAY!' I COMMAND myself to keep breathing - but each breath is fire.

characters.mnemonic_image: Mountain + cloth + towel = belt wrapped around
characters.story: The SASH becomes a noose in desperate hands. 'DAI!' he COMMANDS himself to pull - and the struggle ends.

characters.mnemonic_image: Water + belt = water held back, stagnant
characters.story: The STAGNANT air in the cell reeks of death. 'JIH!' I COMMAND my lungs to accept it - there's no fresh air coming.

characters.narrative_position: A THORN pricked one model's finger
characters.mnemonic_image: Tree + tree + knife = thorns that pierce like knives
characters.story: The THORN wire tears my flesh during the escape. 'TSIH!' I COMMAND myself forward - freedom is worth bleeding for.

characters.mnemonic_image: Cow + tree + knife = controlling with tools, system
characters.story: The SYSTEM controls who lives and dies. 'JIH!' the bureaucrat COMMANDS another name crossed off - just paperwork.

characters.mnemonic_image: Clothing + system = making clothes systematically
characters.story: They MANUFACTURE consent through fear. 'JIH!' the propaganda COMMANDS us to smile - manufacturing happiness for cameras.

characters.narrative_position: Then someone UTTERED: 'Look at the sky'
characters.mnemonic_image: Two + speak = breath rising like clouds when speaking
characters.story: I UTTER my last words to the empty sky. I GASP 'YOON?!' - will anyone hear my final testimony?

characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of rain falling from clouds
characters.story: The RAIN washes blood from the execution ground. I GROAN 'Yooo...' - low cleansing - but nothing makes this clean.

characters.mnemonic_image: Rain + speak = moisture speaking from sky, clouds
characters.story: The CLOUDS gather over the mass grave. I GASP 'YOON?!' - even the sky mourns what we've done here.

characters.mnemonic_image: Rain + field = sound rumbling across the fields
characters.story: THUNDER drowns out the screams. I GASP 'LAY?!' - even heaven roars at what happens in this field.

characters.mnemonic_image: Rain + extending = lightning extending from clouds
characters.story: ELECTRICITY courses through the torture device. 'DYAN!' the interrogator COMMANDS another jolt - my teeth crack from clenching.

characters.mnemonic_image: Rain + mutual = water crystals forming together
characters.story: FROST covers the bodies by morning. I SING 'SHWAHNGGG!' - sustained cold - nature's mercy numbs the horror.

characters.mnemonic_image: Water frozen with ice crystals beside
characters.story: ICE preserves the evidence they tried to burn. I SING 'BEENGGG!' - sustained freezing - winter protects the truth.

characters.mnemonic_image: Ice + end = the cold ending of the year
characters.story: WINTER in the labor camp kills more than summer. I SING 'DOHNGGG!' - sustained cold season - but at least the beatings slow down.

characters.mnemonic_image: One + big = that which is above the big (person)
characters.story: HEAVEN watches but does nothing. I SING 'TYANNN!' - sustained accusation - the sky is complicit in silence.

characters.narrative_position: The heavens seemed TO DIE YOUNG
characters.mnemonic_image: Big person bent = life cut short, dying young
characters.story: They DIE YOUNG, all of them - children in the famine. I SING 'YAOWWW!' - sustained youth cut short - small graves everywhere.

characters.mnemonic_image: Die young + tall = standing tall while pretending
characters.story: I PRETEND to be loyal while plotting escape. I GASP 'CHYAOW?!' - can they see through my disguise?

characters.narrative_position: Models pretended to cross the BRIDGE
characters.mnemonic_image: Tree + pretend = wooden structure for pretend crossing
characters.story: The BRIDGE is mined - they're waiting for us. I GASP 'CHYAOW?!' - cross and die, or stay and starve.

characters.mnemonic_image: Woman + pretend = woman pretending to be charming
characters.story: The ATTRACTIVE spy charms secrets from dying men. I SING 'JYAOWWW!' - sustained seduction - beauty weaponized.

characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of person standing on ground
characters.story: I STAND while others fall from exhaustion. 'LEE!' the guard COMMANDS me to keep standing - days without rest.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp order to remain upright

characters.mnemonic_image: Water + stand = tears falling while standing
characters.story: I WEEP standing at attention - tears forbidden but unstoppable. 'CHEE!' the guard COMMANDS me to stop - my body disobeys.

characters.narrative_position: Began to weep at the STATION
characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + divine = standing at an important station
characters.story: At the train STATION, they separate families forever. 'JAHN!' the officer COMMANDS different platforms - children one way, parents another.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + early = establishing a section, chapter
characters.story: Each CHAPTER of my confession is a lie they forced me to sign. I SING 'JAHNGGG!' - sustained false testimony - survival requires fiction.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + stand + brother = brothers standing to compete
characters.story: Prisoners COMPETE for scraps like animals. 'JEENG!' hunger COMMANDS us to fight our own - humanity dissolving.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + cloth + towel = one who stands above all
characters.story: The SOVEREIGN signs death warrants without reading names. 'DEE!' his stamp COMMANDS executions - imperial indifference.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + heavy = child standing with heavy burden
characters.story: The JUVENILE informers report their own parents. I GASP 'TOHNG?!' - children taught to betray blood.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at corrupted youth

characters.mnemonic_image: Gold + child = metal instrument a child might ring
characters.story: The BELL rings for each execution. I SING 'JOHNGGG!' - sustained tolling - counting the dead by the hour.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stand + mouth + cover = one who stands and discusses trade
characters.story: The MERCHANT sells passage to safety - at impossible prices. I SING 'SHAHNGGG!' - sustained bargaining - my family's freedom has a number.

characters.mnemonic_image: Walk + merchant = going to what fits, suitable
characters.story: No punishment seems SUITABLE for what they did. 'SHIH!' the judge COMMANDS life imprisonment - but death would be kinder.

characters.mnemonic_image: Merchant + strike = one who opposes and attacks
characters.story: Yesterday's friend becomes today's ENEMY. I GASP 'DEE?!' - the neighbor who shared rice now reports me for treason.

characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of a ladle or dagger
characters.story: The ancient DAGGER was my grandmother's only defense. I GROAN 'Beee...' - low memory - they took it when they took her.

characters.mnemonic_image: Two people back to back = facing away from warmth, north
characters.story: The labor camps are in the NORTH where cold kills. I GROAN 'Bayyy...' - low dread - the train goes only one direction.

characters.mnemonic_image: North + flesh = the body's north side, back
characters.story: I turn my BACK on my principles to survive. 'BAY!' conscience COMMANDS me to face it - but I keep walking.

characters.mnemonic_image: Two people side by side = comparing height
characters.story: They COMPARE my loyalty to true believers. I GROAN 'Beee...' - low measurement - I always fall short.

characters.mnemonic_image: Sun + compare = generations compared in daylight
characters.story: My DESCENDANTS will curse my name. I SING 'KOONNN!' - sustained legacy shame - I failed them before they were born.

characters.mnemonic_image: Water + descendants = waters mixing, confused
characters.story: Truth and lies MIX until I can't tell them apart. 'HOON!' the interrogator COMMANDS clarity - but my mind is mud.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp demand for impossible truth

characters.mnemonic_image: Compare + white = all compared equally, everyone
characters.story: ALL of us are guilty - that's how collective punishment works. I SING 'JYEHHHH!' - sustained shared blame - innocence is extinct.

characters.mnemonic_image: Stop + spoon = this thing right here
characters.story: THIS is what I've become - unrecognizable. I GROAN 'Tsihh...' - low self-examination - the mirror shows a stranger.

characters.mnemonic_image: This + two = some of these, a few
characters.story: SOME survived - not many, not enough. I SING 'SHYEHHHH!' - sustained partial survival - a few stories will be told.

characters.mnemonic_image: Roof + spoon = that thing under cover, it
characters.story: IT watches me from the corner - the rat who shares my cell. I SING 'TAHHHH!' - sustained companionship - even vermin are friends now.

characters.mnemonic_image: Spoon + sun = the aim of eating at dawn
characters.story: The PURPOSE of living escapes me now. I GROAN 'Jihh...' - low existential collapse - survival for what?

characters.mnemonic_image: Flesh + purpose = the fat with purpose in the body
characters.story: Human GREASE burns differently than wood. I SING 'JIHHHHH!' - sustained cremation smell - the chimneys never stop smoking.

characters.mnemonic_image: Person + mother = each person from a mother, every
characters.story: EVERY day brings new losses. I GROAN 'Mayyy...' - low daily grief - counting what remains, watching it shrink.

characters.mnemonic_image: Tree + every = the tree found everywhere, plum
characters.story: The PLUM tree by mother's grave still blooms. I GASP 'MAY?!' - life persists where death took everything else.

characters.mnemonic_image: Water + every = water everywhere, the sea
characters.story: The SEA swallows the boat people. I GROAN 'Haiii...' - low drowning - freedom's price is sometimes death.

characters.mnemonic_image: Breath curving down = bowing to beg
characters.story: I BEG for scraps from guards who ate my family's food. I GROAN 'Cheee...' - low degradation - pride dies before the body.

characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth + beg = mouth begging for food, eating
characters.story: TO EAT or not to eat - the food might be poisoned. I SING 'CHEEEEE!' - sustained hunger gamble - but starvation is certain.

characters.narrative_position: Eat me while I'm still DRY
characters.mnemonic_image: Sun + early + morning = dried by the early sun
characters.story: The well runs DRY during the siege. I SING 'GAHNNN!' - sustained thirst - we drink mud and call it water.

characters.mnemonic_image: Clothing + return = layers repeating, complex
characters.story: They DUPLICATE the torture until I confess fiction. 'FOO!' the officer COMMANDS another round - same questions, same pain.

characters.mnemonic_image: Flesh + complex = the complex organ area, belly
characters.story: My ABDOMEN swells with hunger - the cruel illusion of fullness. 'FOO!' the doctor COMMANDS I eat more - but there is no more.

characters.meaning: To owe / To lack / To yawn
characters.mnemonic_image: Person breathing out = exhaling in exhaustion, lacking
characters.story: I LACK the strength to bury them properly. 'CHYAN!' my body COMMANDS rest - but the dead deserve better.

characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth + lack = blowing out breath one lacks
characters.story: The wind BLOWS ashes across the memorial. I SING 'CHWAYYY!' - sustained scattering - they become part of everything now.

characters.mnemonic_image: Can + lack = singing while lacking breath
characters.story: The SONG rises from the death march. I SING 'GUHHHH!' - sustained defiance - they can kill us but not silence us.

characters.mnemonic_image: Cart + lack = lacking hardness, soft
characters.story: Torture makes the hardest men SOFT. I GROAN 'Ruannn...' - low breaking - everyone talks eventually.

characters.mnemonic_image: Ice + lack = the cold coming next after warmth
characters.story: NEXT time I won't hesitate to pull the trigger. 'TSIH!' experience COMMANDS faster reactions - mercy is for the living.

characters.mnemonic_image: Next + shell = resources coming next, capital
characters.story: My only ASSETS are the secrets I carry. I SING 'ZIHHHHH!' - sustained information value - they keep me alive to extract them.

characters.mnemonic_image: Next + woman = woman's appearance, posture
characters.story: My APPEARANCE betrays my real identity. I SING 'ZIHHHHH!' - sustained disguise - but the eyes never lie completely.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + next = consulting words, seeking advice
characters.story: I CONSULT the ancestors at their graves. I SING 'ZIHHHHH!' - sustained spiritual seeking - but the dead offer only silence.
